verses.verse: “To the angel of the Church in Ephesus,[c] write: “ ‘These are the words of the one who holds the seven stars in his right hand and who walks in the midst of the seven lampstands:

“ ‘ “I know your deeds, your hard work, and your endurance. I know that you cannot tolerate wicked people, and how you have put to the test those who claim to be apostles but are not, and have found them to be impostors.
I am also aware of your perseverance and how you have toiled for my name without becoming weary.
“ ‘ “However, I have this complaint against you: you have lost the love you had at first.
Remember from where you have fallen. Repent and do as you did originally. Otherwise, unless you repent, I will come to you and remove your lampstand from its place.
Nonetheless, this may be said in your favor: you detest the works of the Nicolaitans, which I also hate.
“ ‘ “Whoever has ears should listen to what the Spirit says[d] to the Churches. To anyone who is victorious, I will give the right to eat from the tree of life that is in the paradise of God.” ’
“To the angel of the Church in Smyrna,[f] write: “ ‘These are the words of the First and the Last, who was dead and came to life again:
“ ‘ “I know of your hardships and your poverty, but in reality you are rich. I am aware of the slander of those who claim to be Jews but are actually members of the synagogue of Satan.

Do not be frightened when thinking about the sufferings that you will have to endure. The devil will throw some of you into prison so that you may be tested, and you will endure affliction for ten days. Remain faithful until death, and I will give you the crown of life.
“ ‘ “Whoever has ears should listen to what the Spirit says to the Churches. Anyone who is victorious will not be harmed by the second death.” ’
“To the angel of the Church in Pergamum,[h] write: “ ‘These are the words of the one who has the sharp double-edged sword:

“ ‘ “I know that you live in the place where Satan is enthroned. Yet you have remained firm in support of my name, and you did not deny your faith in me even at the time when Antipas,[i] my faithful witness, was put to death among you, where Satan lives.

“ ‘ “Nevertheless, I have a few things against you. Some of you are holding to the teaching of Balaam,[j] who instructed Balak to place temptations in the path of the Israelites, encouraging them to eat food sacrificed to idols and to engage in fornication.
Likewise, there are some of you who follow the teaching of the Nicolaitans.
Therefore, repent. If you do not do so, I will come to you quickly and attack them with the sword of my mouth.

“ ‘ “Whoever has ears should listen to what the Spirit says to the Churches. To anyone who is victorious I will give some of the hidden manna. I will also give him a white stone, upon which will be inscribed a new name, known only to the person who receives it.” ’
“To the angel of the Church in Thyatira,[l] write: “ ‘These are the words of the Son of God who has eyes like a burning flame and feet like burnished bronze:
“ ‘ “I know your deeds—your love, your faithfulness, your service, and your endurance—and that you are doing greater works than you did at first.

Nevertheless, I have this against you, that you tolerate that woman Jezebel, who calls herself a prophetess and who by her teaching is luring my servants into acts of fornication and encouraging them to eat food that has been sacrificed to idols.
“ ‘ “I have given her time to repent, but she refuses to repent of her fornication.
So I will cast her onto a bed of pain, and all those who commit adultery with her will suffer intensely unless they renounce her practices.
I will also strike her children dead. Thereby all the Churches will be shown that I am the one who searches minds and hearts and I will give to each of you what your works deserve.

“ ‘ “And I say to the rest of you in Thyatira who have not accepted this teaching and who have no knowledge of what are designated as the deep secrets of Satan,[m] I shall not impose any further burden on you,
but hold firmly to what you have until I come.
“ ‘ “To anyone who is victorious and perseveres in doing my works until the end, I will give authority over the nations,
the same authority that I received from my Father, to rule them with an iron rod and shatter them like clay pots.
And to such a person I will also give the morning star.
“ ‘ “Whoever has ears should listen to what the Spirit says to the Churches.” ’
